Key Match Events: West Indies won by 9 wickets (with 17 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: England's white-ball squad is still recovering from the Ashes debacle
West Indies are trying to mould a new team fit to lace their forebears' Champion-dancing shoes
Phil Simmons believes his side has plenty room for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kensington Oval will be limited to 50% capacity due to Covid restrictions
Scores were surprisingly low at the venue during the 2019 CPL
The forecast suggests that cross-winds could be a factor
Others: Jason Roy seems to have his game brain in gear after a blistering 36-ball hundred in England's warm-up match
Nicholas Pooran's time is now as he averages 23.47 in 49 T20Is
Liam Livingstone missed England's warm-up game with a mild illness and will sit out the opening T20I
